properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Showers of blessing Showers of blessing we need Mercy drops round us are falling But for the showers we plead{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There shall be showers of blessing This is the promise of love There shall be seasons refreshing Sent from the Savior above{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There shall be showers of blessing Precious reviving again Over the hills and the valleys Sound of abundance of rain{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There shall be showers of blessing Send them upon us O Lord Grant to us now a refreshing Come and now honor Thy Word{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There shall be showers of blessing Oh that today they might fall Now as to God we're confessing Now as on Jesus we call{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}There shall be showers of blessing If we but trust and obey There shall be seasons refreshing If we let God have His way{/lang-eng}
